title: PeppersCore
author: PeppersCore
created_time: June 26, 2022, 03:56:56 PMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 06:50:02 PM by PeppersCore
content: > EPPE < PeppersCore.The coin was created out of love for hot peppers.We all love its taste and that's what makes it SUPER.Eating hot peppers is like a journey into the unknownLike a trip to the jungle 1000 years ago - unforgettable experiences.PeppersCore - EPPE coinOne day it will be a prize in a hot pepper eater competition.People who are just like us in love with hot pepper.I think everyone has tried to eat the fire pepper once.And you know what he writes about.Just watch one movie on you tube and you will understandWhy the EPPE coin was created ...This is something that cannot be overlooked - this flavor and this oneThe thrill of this fever of competition, these tears and joy.PeppersCore...>.> EPPE <. <.A lot of programmers' workpeople who took their timeThey put all their knowledge and heart into it.Miners, pool operators and coin producers..... THANK YOU VERY MUCH !.I am the originator of the coin.An observer of needs and simple solutions.I don't want to promise you a quick replacementand trade >>> air <<<.Either a good product or not at all.Everything takes a lot of time and workScrypt Proof of Work algorithmName: PepperCoreEPPE coin abbreviationAddress letter Â Eversion of a wallet also has a scriptkey starting with P and a scriptkey2 starting with SRPC port 9229P2P port 9119starting block reward at - 3 EPPEHalving each 31800 blocksBlock time - 2 minutesCoin delivery by 3'180'000 Max coins..... >>> No bonus coin <<< .....PeppersCore coin [EPPE]Soft info:- I am the originator of this project- I will provide development for EPPE at the level of:a) wallets: Windows, Linux, Apple PC, Androidb) minesc) exchangesd) explorerd) websitee) project developmentEPPE is free from manipulation from the outset.No Premine etc.I invite every miner and later investor to EPPE.The mining pool we chose to starthttps://discord.gg/FQy6y226MNhttps://mcmpool.eu/site/miningIt's an proven pool.You can find and get some cool coins there.. EPPE , DiminutiveCoin ( DIMI )and many other coins.(that pool accepts an SSL stratum connections at port 3416)Despite 43'132 projects of crypto coins [data as of June 12, 2022]PeppersCore name and ticker: EPPE are genuine and there is no other such coin.The EPPE coin promotes the cultivation and consumption of tasty and healthy hot peppers.Link to Github / wallethttps://github.com/pepperscore-project/pepperscore/releases/tag/v.0.18.1.0Link to the mining poolhttps://mcmpool.eu/stratum+tcp://mcmpool.eu:3415 -u Your EPPE address -p c = EPPEhttps://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73SvVbFryL0&t=546sThe current website - which we will be buildingnew site under constructionToday , nowNo need for more News channels ,Everything will be done in turn with time.Let's start and wish you a lot of fun and hot peppers Regards.

comments.body: Hi.Everything will be.Slowly, calmly. Forward - nibbling hot pepper;)

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.created_time: June 27, 2022, 09:31:27 AMLast edit: June 27, 2022, 09:42:28 AM by PeppersCore
comments.body: Hi.Due to the large flood of offers of help and cooperationFrom people associated with the ad.Kindly informs that today is not the time.We have a Plan - a plan that is like running a long distance runner.It takes time and a lot of reflection / analysis and going against the wind.In blizzards, hot in the rain and you can't change your plan.The direction is one - forward, slowly.Like an old train centimeter by centimeter - forward.I will try to describe the informationFrom the plans and implementation of the project.I will not reveal everything at once.There must always be something some mystery.Something we don't knowSomething we are waiting for.The pepper grows slowly, we plant it in early spring.Grows matures in the summer, we collect in the fall.Who is patient and likes paprika ........................I will definitely repeat it, but I will write it again.This is the> PeppersCore <..EPPE project... >>> Proof of work (PoW).There is no bonus.There is no gift coin bag.There is no fear that there will be pumping and strong sales.Very Little - Few coins earned by POW during the Test and Commissioning are for the futureFor the Winners of the Hot Pepper Competition.And in guessing games - we play on 4 servers.This is few coins.There will be no discharges.You can get coins by digging POW.Winning guessing games.In the future, buy on the stock exchange.These are the only ways.I am asking for your understanding.You work miner in the pool - Extract share, not solo.Then every little miner has a chance to get EPPE coins.When you dig SOLO, only you collect the bag of coins - only YOU.So when only you have the coins, no one else is interested in them . The little miners get NOTHING and go away.Strength is in the group, there is no solo space.It is as if you are sitting on a large bag with a huge amountGold bars and he could not buy anything and exchange for them.Together, we can do a lot.Together, in harmony and understanding, we can create a better tomorrow.It's like growing peppercorns - any pepper.Take care, look after, water - take care and your harvest will be great.For those who understandBest regards and have a nice day.https://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: Hi.I have no good information for you.Please be understanding.You work as a miner in the pool - Get a share - not solo.Then every little miner has a chance to get EPPE coins.When you dig SOLO, only you collect the bag of coins - only YOU !.So when only you have the coins, no one else is interested in them.Little miners get NOTHING and go.I need to rethink and discuss it all.It's not what we wanted ..Strength is in the group, there is no place for solo.

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: Hi.PeppersCore - EPPEOur old train - locomotive.Moves slowly in the chosen direction - Forward.Everything is settled, written out and works are divided.Take your time slowly - take it easy.From step to step forward.In the next posts, I will describe our plan a littleUntil the whole list of events and our goals come out.Now he gives a link to:block explorer - http://161.97.142.60:5555/Have fun .I wish a lot of sun - peppers like the sun;)and a lot of cold limoniad (with paprika).Regardshttps://mcmpool.eu/site/miningstratum+tcp://mcmpool.eu:3415 -u Your EPPE address -p c = EPPEhttps://discord.gg/FQy6y226MNhttps://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: PeppersCore....... EPPE.The road Map has been completedThe goals we have set will be realized.Route to the selected last stopIt is very far away.......Let's face it, there are so many coins today.And finding the one you want takes a lot of work.Lots of research and some luck......Some ..HISTORY.We tested many coins, many possibilitiesVarious combinations of POW and POS, POW. Much to write ..The first for testing, The EPPE coinWas created two months ago............ PeppersCore - POW only... ZERO premine - ZERO bonus!.Many people know that I love hot peppers.He suggested the name, a good programmer came up with it.If he ever allows, she will write his name.Today ,here THANK you Buddy......In the first stages, more than 10 coins were createdVarious variants, but our best opinion isPOW only, although everyone likes % - ownership.Well, we stayed with the original.Working coin names have always been associated with sharpnesswith something special.I*t had to be a spicy name From hell .Once the coin was finished. Main programmerHe breathed a sigh of relief and called the last coin working................ FRANKENSTEIN - Just live.!.He got up, raised his hands and said: ..........Here it is - EPPE !.Really great moments of joy and expectations have been leftSomething special was created - PeppersCore......And I will repeat myself for sure.Thank you good friend.A good person and a good programmer.If he ever allows it, she will write his name too.(There are rules and you mustn't break them - there must be permission!).....From the very beginning, a decision was made not to advertisetoo much EPPE.The surfeit of advertising can be disastrous.You have to slowly dose the information and build / implement itPlan.Plan, Plan and many temptations from the start.Do not stray from the course.You cannot turn - the road is one and the destination is chosen......... PeppersCoreThe goal is the most important - Praising Sharp Red, Green, YellowEVERY super-strong pepper/paprika......The tests were positive.The coin started to be mined by miners is fine.We spent a wallet on windows.Others appear at the right time.Our next plans.I try to reach people who participate in the competitionHot pepper eater - I've always liked this competition.This thrill, this taste, this emotion.Try to eat and you will understand what the thing is.Burning in a person, tears, joy ... it cannot be toldYou just have to experience it......One of the goals is to make a coin in real life.Not much - it's a symbol after all.So a limited quantity, maybe 100 or 300 pieces?The decision was not made.A black coin with yellow peppers.It's a good idea, but let's put it aside.Today let's focus on mining......We keep extracting POW.It's still easy now.Now there is 3 EPPE for 1 blockAfter Halving, it will be half.And that's not much time leftHalving each 31800 blocksWe need coins.The needs are huge.Promotions, advertising, competitions, guessing games. We fund prizes in games: guessing, trivia and similar entertainment.I do not promise it, but there is a chance that we will test play today.For the first time in the easiest guessing game ever.On the server - PeppersCore -EPPEhttps://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7Please visit the server.As a Community Manager - EPPE I try to write as often as time allows me to write about everything Related to paprika and our project.The goal for yesterday is..block explorer - http://161.97.142.60:5555The goal for today is a game - a test guessing gameThe prizes will be EPPE coins.These are symbolic rewards for guessing the questions correctly.I Of course, fun, fun - taking away from everyday gray matter.SATURDAY, play, eat pizza with paprikaAnd let the EPPE coin give us joy I wish you all the best.Lots of fun and a nice day.Regards.https://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7Please visit the server.And get coins - PeppersCore -EPPEhttps://mcmpool.eu/site/mining

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: Hi.I'm sorry to see that.SOLO reigns in the pool AGAIN.And for the little miners, there is an empty plate.So what if you'll have a lot of coins?Only you ... alone ...?I can buy EPPE.If anyone has and wants to sell.I need it for promotion, advertising and giftsThe announcements are on the serverhttps://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7One of the main purposes of the coin is to rewardin the hot pepper eater competition.We want to organize such contests(I know there are a lot of them)But we want ours - ours.With the country band and fun - paprika is joyHot pepper is something wonderful - an adventure.We want to do the competition next fall.This year the coin is too fresh.Regards.

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: I am not able to convince the miners digging SOLO toshare.There are no more new little miners.Nobody will hold a little machine and get NOTHING!Because all the coins are taken by the BIG SOLO miners.If we start our way to VICTORY today.This is our plan, our project will go in the right direction and on time.If we lose and SOLO continues to win - everything will be delayed ...Do you like hot peppers? - Join - NOW for mining - "share".... >>> Yes, you decide! <<< ...

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: Just information.I am not able to convince an investor to go to the stock exchange Before the pepper-eater competition.I simplified the road map a lot.The deadlines have been postponed.Goals have not changed.There will be no stock exchange this year.I wrote more on discord.Regards.

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: Due to ongoing wallet fix to allow compiling on older Linux versions - currently ongoing pool mining will be suspended until fix is released to the public. Stay tuned.

comments.author: PeppersCore
comments.body: The PeppersCore GitHub repository source code has been corrected & updated.Now it should be easier to self compile daemon and qt wallet. Compiling was successful using Ubuntu 18.Compiled Qt wallet also was test run on Ubuntu 20.I also updated the compiled Linux binaries in the Release sectionYou can mine / mine all the time on your computer - with your wallet.I will write when the pools will be turned on...............If you do not know how to mine with a wallet on your computer, the manual - photo is on the channel: information-pepperscore-eppe.https://discord.gg/BKa83HUjc7
